WorldDesc: An advanced access key. Use it to unlock the global features of the central system and open the door to escape.

Name: <color=#FC8B1E>Red-Blue Capsule</color>
WorldDesc: A mysterious medicine, half red and half blue. It potentially conceals the power to grant people the ability to see through illusions.

Name: <color=#FC8B1E>Prism Core</color>
WorldDesc: The core driver for advanced optical components. It allows the object to enter an invisible state when activated, easily evading conventional detection methods.

Name: <color=#FC8B1E>Beam Sword</color>
Description: Upon triggering QTE, grants <color=#4a70b9>1</color> random Signal Orb.
WorldDesc: This weapon has displayed unimaginable wisdom and can even be hailed as a creation existing only in imagination.

Name: <color=#FC8B1E>Disordered Fiber Strand</color>
Description: QTE cooldown <color=#4a70b9>-100%</color>. Grants a set of <color=#4a70b9>3-Ping Orbs</color> upon triggering QTE.
WorldDesc: An extremely optimized scheme for vector attack components, delivering efficient countermeasure effectiveness. Requires execution in a stable environment to mitigate potential disordered scenarios.

Name: <color=#FC8B1E>Abandoned Laser Gun</color>
WorldDesc: A prototype weapon abandoned here for unknown reasons, lacking signs of mass production.

Name: <color=#FC8B1E>"Phantom G720" Strobe Light</color>
WorldDesc: A cost-effective, durable general-purpose tactical strobe light, renowned for its exceptional battery performance. Serves as one of the most commonly utilized tools in military operations.

Name: <color=#FC8B1E>Illusionary Cube</color>
WorldDesc: A valuable experimental mimicry component capable of randomly acquiring resources and producing copies, exhibiting excellent object adaptation.
